alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Mercer; Putnam; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 8:52AM CDT until June 29 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR GRUNDY...SULLIVAN...MERCER AND PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 851 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Mercer to 11 miles east of Spickard to near Galt, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Milan, Unionville, Princeton, Green City, Mercer, Greencastle, Browning, Spickard, Galt, Newtown, Humphreys, Pollock, Lucerne, Tindall, Harris, Powersville, Osgood, Mill Grove and Reger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Grundy and Mercer Counties. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
